WorkItem.ClosedComment: It's affecting the uptime of your proc effects, like Berserker
WorkItem.Description: For some reason I have a lot higher stats in rawr then I do in WoW. I have a fury warrior and if I equip an expertise gem rawr show my attack power go up and I dont think it should be doing that, it doesnt in game, if anything I lose attack power. Just an odd problem where it showed expertise gems to be better then str in some cases.
WorkItem.Summary: Expertise changing stats that it doesnt effect in-game

Comments.Message: Isn't this because the in-game stats are showing your expertise against level 80 mobs, while Rawr is showing for boss-level mobs?
